Description
The protagonist of the game, Zack is the same impeccable reputatsiey.V 2027, cracking the protection of bank computer, Zack destroyed
contributions in excess of five hundred million, but was caught and convicted of
it's for life.

KGB general FWA Devlin (Devlin) Zach pulls out
prison, with the condition that he will perform a secret mission. The purpose of the job
- To penetrate the complex Cartel "cyber" (Cyberia) and find
new secret weapon.

Zach, passing through many trials to the gun. This
artificially grown cybernetic organism - "Project Future Perfect"
with reason, like a human. Then Zach learns from the insidious
Devlin, that the real purpose of the task - to destroy the project together with
by Zach with bombs transplant surgeons in FWA
our hero's brain.

The only chance of escape - to merge with the "Project Future Perfect," which
Zach does. Joining together in one powerful body - Sayberion
(Cyberion), Zack and "Project Future Perfect" take off from the surface of the Earth and
Devlin revenge by destroying the main space station FWA.
Cast off an explosion Sayberion falls to Earth and is broken somewhere
Rockies. Thus ends the first part of the game.

After this incident, the world began to emerge centers
revolt against the tyranny of the FWA, there are rebels of the underground (Rebel
Underground). They are, in spite of the shortage of men and weapons,
resist the forces of FWA.

Zack picks up a rescue team, led by John
Corbin (Dr. John Corbin).

Dr. John Corbin, more than fifty years of his life
develop weapons of mass destruction, working only for personal
benefits. He was in the group of scientists involved in the development of the project
Future Perfect, but was dismissed from the cases because of his desire to use
project exclusively for military purposes. Now a new guide FWA
it provides everything you need for development is super-weapon.

Scientists have picked up Zack, separated from his body and Sayberiona
placed in suspended animation for kriosklade FWA (FWA Cryonic Storage Facility).
Zack was placed in one of the capsules in stock and is shipped in a deep
sleep at a temperature below minus one hundred and eighty degrees.

After the merger with Zach cybernetic organism in its tissues
kolosalnye mutations occurred. With a sample of tissue, Dr.
Corbin managed by mutations wants to create a terrible new weapon
destructive power. Corbin has developed a weapon and began to multiply
nano-infected cells contained in the tissues of Zack who
are a powerful nano-weapons. But John Corbin did not realize that the blood of Zack
contains the(vaccine) for this weapon.

Rebels have to get Zack in secret laboratories of Dr.
Corbin (Dr. Corbin's Secret Lab), to get thebefore
What Corbin apply new weapons.
